title: Twilight Characters
description: How well do you know the characters?

questions.question: Who is the leader of the Cullen family?
questions.explanation: Carlisle Cullen is the patriarch who created most of the Cullen family and works as a doctor.

questions.question: What is Edward's special vampire ability?
questions.explanation: Edward can read minds, though notably he cannot read Bella's thoughts.

questions.question: Alice can see the future.
questions.explanation: Alice Cullen has the ability to see visions of the future, though they can change based on decisions.

questions.question: Who is Jasper's special ability?
questions.explanation: Jasper can sense and manipulate the emotions of those around him.

questions.question: Who is Esme Cullen?

options.text: Carlisle's wife and the family's mother figure

questions.explanation: Esme is Carlisle's wife and serves as the loving mother figure to all the Cullen 'children.'

questions.question: Who is known for being the strongest Cullen?
questions.explanation: Emmett is the physically strongest of the Cullens, known for his love of physical challenges.

questions.question: Rosalie initially welcomes Bella into the family.
questions.explanation: Rosalie is cold and unwelcoming to Bella at first, envious of her humanity and choices.

questions.question: What is Jacob Black's relationship to Bella at the start?
questions.explanation: Jacob and Bella knew each other as children because their fathers, Billy and Charlie, are old friends.
